**Update 1.5** 

Can now save and load your collections of hashtags! You can now save these locally to load and use on your social media site of preference!

**

Copy and paste Hashtags with ease on Bluesky with BlueTagConverter!

Borrowing hashtags from previous posts on Bluesky? The BlueTag Converter will ensure the formatting is correct and concise when pasted into your new post. 

Simply copy the tags from a post on Bluesky, paste them into the input textbox of BlueTag Converter, and click the “Convert” button. 

An output will be generated, so you can select the entirety of it by clicking into the output text box, pressing Ctrl+A or CMD+A, and copying with Ctrl+C or CMD+C.

After copying, paste the corrected hashtags into your new post to prevent having to manually correct the spacing, etc.
